full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA, 'DI CHED GROGS AEM CHI BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI KAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANGS PAS, BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG ,LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN BRLAB SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LTAR CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MDO, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD PA'I ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG @008B PAR SBYIN SREG GI THABS SKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUG CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUG BYED KYI TSIG BKA' SDUS NAS, RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS GA-YAL KHRAL DU DBYUG CES ME MO GLANG LO'I HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSES BZANG PAR 'GRIGS PA'O, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CHA MCHIS NAS, BLA MA LTA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGES, 'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BDE LEGS SU CIG BKRA SHIS, ,
